column1: My family wishes all Pennsylvanians Americans and @realDonaldTrump and his family a Happy Thanksgiving. We are grateful for @realDonaldTrump and for his leading the charge on the most rapid solution to a virus that anyone could have done or hoped for. God Bless America.

Yesterday @SecretarySonny announced a new child nutrition rule that maintains flexibility for schools in providing meals to students and expands the variety of milk options that previously were not allowed. To learn more please visit: https://t.co/HmfoSdsQLL
